clue_discovery_total.name: clue_discovery_total
clue_discovery_total.description: Tracks the total number of clues discovered by Detective Graves during the investigation.

suspect_interrogation_count.name: suspect_interrogation_count
suspect_interrogation_count.description: Counts the number of times each suspect is interrogated by Detective Graves.

evidence_analysis_time_seconds.name: evidence_analysis_time_seconds
evidence_analysis_time_seconds.description: Measures the time taken to analyze each piece of evidence collected from the crime scene.

suspect_suspicion_level.name: suspect_suspicion_level
suspect_suspicion_level.description: Gauges the level of suspicion Detective Graves has for each suspect based on gathered evidence and interrogation results.

forensic_analysis_accuracy.name: forensic_analysis_accuracy
forensic_analysis_accuracy.description: Assesses the accuracy of forensic analysis conducted by Dr. Ashcroft in identifying key details of the crime.

decision_iterations_total.name: decision_iterations_total
decision_iterations_total.description: Tracks the number of iterations Detective Graves goes through before making a final decision on the killer.

evidence_correlation_index.name: evidence_correlation_index
evidence_correlation_index.description: Measures the correlation between different pieces of evidence and their relevance to the suspects.

investigation_progress_percentage.name: investigation_progress_percentage
investigation_progress_percentage.description: Indicates the overall progress of the investigation towards solving the crime.

false_lead_count.name: false_lead_count
false_lead_count.description: Counts the number of false leads encountered during the investigation.

suspect_alibi_verification_time_seconds.name: suspect_alibi_verification_time_seconds
suspect_alibi_verification_time_seconds.description: Measures the time taken to verify the alibis of each suspect.

detective_stress_level.name: detective_stress_level
detective_stress_level.description: Monitors the stress level of Detective Graves throughout the investigation, which can impact decision-making.

public_perception_index.name: public_perception_index
public_perception_index.description: Evaluates the public's perception of the investigation's progress and Detective Graves' effectiveness.
